title: [Ta'Illistim Keep, Citizenry]
description: Pale sunlight filters in through the leaded glass panes of the windows here, providing barely sufficient illumination for the clerks working diligently at their desks.  Several patrons lean against a gleaming mistwood counter that partitions the room, carefully scanning official-looking documents under the watchful eye of a clerk.

Pale light from candles set in burnished faenor sconces  provides barely sufficient illumination for the clerks working diligently at their desks.  Several patrons lean against a gleaming mistwood counter that partitions the room, carefully scanning official-looking documents under the watchful eye of a clerk.
